summary.span: 获取或设置用于填充内容区域背景的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the used to fill the background of the content area.

value.span: 用于填充内容区域背景的画笔，或 （不使用背景画笔）。

span.span: The brush used to fill the background of the content area, or to not use a background brush.

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关显示可用预定义画笔颜色的样本表，请参阅 。For a table of swatches that show the available predefined brush colors, see . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 作为示例元素来设置 特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_BackgroundXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textelement_backgroundxaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![屏幕快照：前景为绿色，背景 bisque](~/add/media/textelement-foreback.png "屏幕快照：前景为绿色，背景为橘黄色")![Screenshot: Foreground of green, background bisque](~/add/media/textelement-foreback.png "Screenshot: Foreground of green, background bisque") 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Background](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_background)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Background](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_background)]

summary.span: 获取或设置元素内容的首选顶级字体系列。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the content of the element.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象指定首选字体系列，或具有一个或多个备用字体系列的主要首选字体系列。

span.span: A object that specifies the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.

value.span: 默认值为由 值确定的字体。

span.span: The default is the font determined by the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定多个系列后，第二个和后续的字体系列作为备用系列，在主要字体系列不可用或不适用的情况下使用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此属性仅指定一个首选项。This property specifies a preference only. 如果指定的字体系列不可用，则 会以静默方式回退到 值确定的字体。If the specified font family is not available, the silently falls back to the font determined by the value. 此依赖属性还具有附加的属性用法。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中，使用情况是 `

summary.span: 获取或设置元素内容的字体大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the font size for the content of the element.

value.span: 需要使用到与设备无关的像素的字体大小，大于 0.001 且小于或等于 35791。

span.span: The desired font size to use in device independent pixels, greater than 0.001 and less than or equal to 35791.

value.span: 默认值取决于当前的系统设置和 值。

span.span: The default depends on current system settings and depends on the value.

span.span: is set to a value greater than 35791 or less than or equal to 0.001.

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于元素内容的文本效果集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of text effects to apply to the content of the element.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含一个或多个 对象，这些对象定义了要应用于此元素内容的效果。

span.span: A containing one or more objects that define effects to apply to the content in this element.

value.span: 默认值为 （不是空集合）。

span.span: The default is (not an empty collection).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此属性设置为 "`null`"，并且没有任何与之关联的 。By default, this property is set to `null` and has no associated with it. 在添加任何文本效果之前，请创建新的 并将其分配给此属性。Before adding any text effects, create a new and assign it to this property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个简单的文本效果，并通过 属性将其应用于文本 。The following example shows how to create a simple text effect and apply it to a text through the property. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TextEffects](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_texteffects)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TextEffects](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_texteffects)]

summary.span: 获取该元素内容的当前有效的版式变体。

span.span: Gets the currently effective typography variations for the content of the element.

value.span: 一个 对象，它指定当前有效的版式变体。

span.span: A object that specifies the currently effective typography variations.

value.span: 有关默认版式值的列表，请参见 。

span.span: For a list of default typography values, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅适用于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] 字体。The property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts. 版式变体对不支持变体的字体不起作用。A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant. 有关此主题的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的版式](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf)。For more information on this topic, see [Typography in WPF](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 作为示例元素来设置 特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TypogXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textelement_typogxaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![屏幕快照：修改了版式的文本](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "屏幕快照：改变版式的文本")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 与此相反，下图显示了一个具有默认版式属性的类似示例的呈现效果。In contrast, the following figure shows how a similar example with default typographic properties renders. ![屏幕快照：修改了版式的文本](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "屏幕快照：改变版式的文本")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_typog)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_typog)]
